title: Revenge of the squares
text: Given a number calculate the product N of their digits bigger than zero. The output is the number R of different (!) presentations of N in the form A×A+B×B with A and B being positive integers including zero.InputTwenty tests with one positive integer < 1020.OutputPrint the illustrated above number R for each test.ExampleInput:5778185824586267361855Output:103
